title: 820-02020 5V 0.04A
message:
Cant find any liquid on board.

PPBUS_AON (pin 2/F5200) got 0V (.473 in diode mode)
PP3V8_AON 0V and .340 in diode mode

FF200/1 both got 5V on both sides.
PP3V3_UPC0/1_LDO correct diode mode and voltage when charger connected
PP1V5_UPC0/1_LDO_CORE correct diode mode and voltage when charger connected
PPVBUS_USBC0/1 got 5V

Wont go into DFU mode.

Replaced just in case both CD3217 and still the same issue.

Any idea?

title: 820-02020 5V 0.04A
message: Remove F5200 and check C5250 voltage.

title: 820-02020 5V 0.04A
message:
C5250 had 0V.
Checked input voltage on U5200 and there was 5V so replaced U5200 and all working fine now.
Thanks for help.

title: 820-02020 5V 0.04A
message:
Keep the fuse out.
Then post U5200 basic voltages: P_IN, AUX_DET, SMC_RST_IN, VDDA/P, IRQ*, EN_MVR, AUX_OK, A/BMON.

title: 820-02020 5V 0.04A
message:
P_IN 5.15V
AUX_DET 1.28V
SMC_RST_IN 0.16V
VDDA 5.1V
VDDP 5.1V
IRQ* 0.1V
EN_MVR 5.1V
AUX_OK 1.24V
AMON 0V
BMON 0V

title: 820-02020 5V 0.04A
message:
Wait, the machine is now fixed?
I didn't correctly understand your previous post, I think...

title: 820-02020 5V 0.04A
message: Sorry. Yes, machine is working fine with new U5200
